title: Donger and Urgot finally got skins, so...
body:
...that means that there are no champions left that haven't gotten skins since before 2015.  This is an accomplishment, we're seeing progress, people.
Here is everyone, in order, that still deserve new skins (including those that got gibbed by team skins which don't technically count)

~~Amumu / Udyr - last skin(s): April 2015~~ Mumu and Udyr got new skins! 
{{champion:72}} / {{champion:101}} - last skin(s): April 2015 (NOTE:  Skarner is on the VGU list)
~~Fiddlesticks - last skin: April 2015~~ Fiddle got a new skin!
~~Zilean - last skin: May 2015~~ Zilean got a new skin!
{{champion:82}} / ~~Shaco~~ - last skin~~(s)~~: May 2015 (NOTE:  Mord got a VGU in June 2019); Shaco got a new skin!
~~Rek'Sai~~ / {{champion:154}} - last skin~~(s)~~: June 2015 Rek'Sai got a new skin! (NOTE:  Zac got a team skin in 2017)
~~Aatrox - last skin: July 2015~~ Aatrox got a new skin!
{{champion:429}} - last skin: September 2015 (NOTE: Kali got a team skin in 2016, and has never gotten a new skin that isn't an esports skin)
~~Kassadin - last skin: October 2015~~ Kassaskin!
~~Nunu & Willump - last skin: November 2015~~ N&W got a new skin!
~~Ryze - last skin: December 2015~~ Ryze got a new skin!

And, because I'm kinda obsessed with this crap, here's everyone that hasn't gotten a new skin since their release/rerelease.

{{champion:163}} - released: May 2016 (NOTE: she got a team skin this year)
~~Ryze - released: July 2016 - last skin: December 2015~~ Blue Man got a new skin!
~~Kled - released: August 2016~~ Kled got a new skin!
~~Ivern - released: October 2016~~ Ivern ACTUALLY got a skin, who'd'a thunk?
~~Camille - released: December 2016~~ Cam got a new skin!
{{champion:516}} - released: August 2017
~~Kai'Sa - released: March 2018~~ Kai'Sa got a new skin!
~~Pyke - released: May 2018~~ Pyke got a new skin!
~~Aatrox - released: June 2018 - last skin: July 2015~~ Aatrox got a new skin!
~~Akali - released: August 2018 - last skin: September 2016~~ Akali got a new skin!
~~Nunu & Willump - released: August 2018 - last skin: November 2015~~ N&W got a new skin!
~~Ezreal - released:  October 2018 - last skin: September 2017~~ Ez got a new skin!

Well, that was fun.  It took me an hour to put together so I hope at least _someone_ finds it as fun to read as I do.  Leave any gripes in the comments.  Also, SMASH that subscri-

replies.body: A round of applause for Riot's skin team!
i love the skins team since 2016

wrestler volibear shouldn't count because it's the worst skin ever made

new voli skin 2018

oof rip that skin
just for you...
{{champion:106}}  - last skin: November 2014 (NOTE:  Voli technically got a skin in 2016 but it was garbo so some might not count it;  also, he is high on the VGU list)
I'd really like to see Voli and Ornn get a dual skin release.  I know their Thunder skins already match, but it'd be fun to see them together.  Maybe Anivia can get thrown in there, too.
i feel like eternum volibear would be dope

> [{quoted}](name=Moody P,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=dPmEJEgV,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2018-09-25T17:57:11.485+0000)
>
> wrestler volibear shouldn't count because it's the worst skin ever made
> 
> new voli skin 2018

Let's hope that skin becomes good in his eventual VGU lol

> [{quoted}](name=Moody P,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=dPmEJEgV,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2018-09-25T17:57:11.485+0000)
>
> wrestler volibear shouldn't count because it's the worst skin ever made
> 
> new voli skin 2018

Dude i love that skin, whenever i use it i laugh about how ridiculous it looks
Why is that?
Kled skin just got announced. Check Riot’s YouTube.
Slick
Why does that maokai icon look so weird?

To be honest, that’s not too bad. They accomplished their goal of getting skins out to champions who had gone so far without one despite not being scheduled for a rework.

It feels good to finally say: good job Riot.
So does this mean people will stop shaming everyone else's champion they like for getting a new skin just cause there's isn't as popular
Where’s Quinn on this list? Like, I know she’s not as worse off as others, but it’s been a hot minute since she got a skin.
Heartseeker was in early 2017

Yeah, it hasn't technically been that long since Quinn's last skin. I think the wait just feels worse than it actually is since the skin got revealed on December 6th, 2016 on PBE, and then got officially released a whole two months later in February. Not to mention there were quite a few people who were unhappy with the skin and so are just waiting for the next one.
I really want her to get a skin where Valor is a bat and she's basically an Underlander from Gregor.
well amumu and kled now have new skins so id personally like to see champions who havent gotten a skin since release before new skins for champions with more than 1. just gonna wait for cam and ivern
You put Ryze in twice instead of Ivern.
That was intentional, on both accounts.  Ryze hasn't gotten a non-team skin since his release, and Ivern is... Ivern.
I feel as though they should try to balance out some of the numbers of skins, I mean you got champs with like 10 skins and others with 3.
You do have to take into account the age of a champion though, or they'll only be left with old skins.

{{champion:89}}'s last skin was released in 2016 ... while other champions are probably more deserving of a skin, i'd like to see her get a legacy skin eventually, or something that isn't "knight" themed. Hell, despite PROJECT was cool, it's pretty dull compared to newer PROJECT skins like Vayne's for example. Star Guardian, Demon ... any unique theme would make me so happy.
Whaddya think of the Eclipse skins!?

> [{quoted}](name=QMighty,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=dPmEJEgV,comment-id=00150002,timestamp=2018-11-07T02:17:48.957+0000)
>
> Whaddya think of the Eclipse skins!?

https://lh5.googleusercontent.com/-a97SMCValhY/UdrAO8NUGKI/AAAAAAAABMk/L9U7-4WhGRU/w600-h338-no/CooperWimbledon.gif

I'm a Leona Main, and my favorite game of all time is Dark Souls. Imagine if Riot created a skin just for me. That would be the Eclipse skins. They're everything I wanted, ever.

To say i'm a happy man is an understatement.
same bro
Yeah, I want a skin for my girl that isn't orange.  Dark Waters would be perfect, to go with Dianan

> [{quoted}](name=Caramel Frappe,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=dPmEJEgV,comment-id=0015,timestamp=2018-09-27T00:24:55.701+0000)
>
> {{champion:89}}'s last skin was released in 2016 ... while other champions are probably more deserving of a skin, i'd like to see her get a legacy skin eventually, or something that isn't "knight" themed. Hell, despite PROJECT was cool, it's pretty dull compared to newer PROJECT skins like Vayne's for example. Star Guardian, Demon ... any unique theme would make me so happy.

Leona is a chef in one of her skins and having a summer party in another. Neither of those skins scream "knight" theme.

> [{quoted}](name=QMighty,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=dPmEJEgV,comment-id=00020002,timestamp=2018-09-25T22:14:01.528+0000)
>
> I'd really like to see Voli and Ornn get a dual skin release.  I know their Thunder skins already match, but it'd be fun to see them together.  Maybe Anivia can get thrown in there, too.

They'll probably get a Versus event someday, but it wouldn't be for a while because there are other more popular rivalries that would likely get the event first.

> [{quoted}](name=EdgeLady,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=dPmEJEgV,comment-id=00150001,timestamp=2018-09-27T16:59:05.402+0000)Leona is a chef in one of her skins and having a summer party in another. Neither of those skins scream "knight" theme.

I mean sure, but out of those 2 skins (the summer one came out in 2013), her 4 other skins including the legacy one (Defender Leona) are all heavily knight themed. I also liked how her chef one was unique, but they haven't made another skin for her since.

Would like to see them continue making unique concepts like that, but probably a legacy / epic skin if possible.
I swear, I literally forgot that Kalista existed until I saw this list
My poor girl is more forgotten than Skarner

{{champion:14}}  - Sion received his last skin, Mecha Zero Sion (legendary tier) April 2016.
Hoping the big guy gets something new at some point.
Where’s my boy {{champion:427}} ?
Let's be honest, he's gonna go as long as Yorick without a new skin.

> [{quoted}](name=QMighty,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=dPmEJEgV,comment-id=00100000,timestamp=2018-09-26T17:19:45.836+0000)
>
> Let's be honest, he's gonna go as long as Yorick without a new skin.

Probably.  And just like Yorick it’ll be a half-assed skin no one wanted.
i guess id be more excited if the game was as amazing as the skins coming out.

Lets now make a list of anyone with skins that need to be updated to the new splash standards. Or a list for any champions that have never received a skin that is beyond a 1350 price range. (so basically a legendary)
Hopefully Aatrox skin is coming soon. He will get an IG skin like Camille, but thats cool, skin is a skin. Wonder who the 3 Christmas skin going to be. Any guesses?
Candy Kayn, he's a candy cane
{{champion:223}} is a bit over 3 years old, and the only skin he's gotten since his release was a 750 April Fools' skin that's essentially a light blue chroma.
{{champion:127}}  Ice queen got latest skin from 2016
{{champion:432}}  ... I like Bard.  I want a Bard skin.

They are doing well, just still need a bit more fairness in things. It's great seeing nice skins for Urgot and Heimer (finally, League's lifespan is like 9 years, Heimer went through half of it without a skin). 

But Camille and Ivern need one, Taliyah one that's available all year round and Kindred came out only a few months after Ekko but he's about to get another one while she only has the Super Galaxy from 2 years ago. Xerath is perfect for Dark Star skin, sooner that comes the better.
I'm hoping for either a PP, Arcade, or SG Taliyah skin. I love how the SSG skin came out but, as you said, team skins aren't counted. Hopefully she'll get a skin next year.
jayce and bard both November of 2016
